title: How To Make Health Bars Bigger?
body:
I just recently got an ultra HD monitor (4K), and as much as I love it, the resolution is making things look TINY in game! (see picture here http://postimg.org/image/gyughmhnl/ )

Problems include:

1) Health bars are too small
2) Minimap icons are TINY


Is there any way I can scale this stuff to be bigger? Without having to decrease the resolution of the game?

replies.body:
I'm not too sure how to fix your problem. Like other comments, I would just suggest changing the HUD scales in the Interface Menu in-game. Other than that, I'm not sure in how to help you, sorry.
=(.
EDIT: nvm, the solution I know is reduce resolution. I think there isn't anything else, but I can be wrong.

This worked (I decreased it back to 1600x900, and health bars are back to a good size), but then resolution looks crap...

I wonder if there's a way to do this without decreasing resolution, would be nice! :)

Come on RIOT! Get with the 4k times
If I remember correctly there's an option to 'scale' your HUD in the in-game options. I may be thinking about a different game though...
Nah, your right about the HUD scaling. I think you go into the Interface or gameplay section? Not tooooo sure which one, but it's there.
There is an option to scale the HUD, but i don't think the health bars count as part of the HUD (this is from my memory of doing this like 6 months ago so i'm not actually fully certain.)
Try the stuff in the interface menu, if that doesn't work I'm sure someone else will think of what will.
